version_description:
Editors' Choice in 16 Countries. Apple's Best of 2014! Parents' Choice Gold Award!
-We added an Octopus puzzle! You can build a giant red octopus, make it shoot ink and watch it camouflage itself!
-Marco and Piper are now scuba divers in the reef! You can find them in the bottom tray!
-New start page and refreshed app icon.
-We've reduced the app size by 40%!

​Happy Exploring!​

Editors' Choice in 16 Countries. Apple's Best of 2014! Parents' Choice Gold Award!
-We added an Octopus puzzle! You can build a giant red octopus, make it shoot ink and watch it camouflage itself!
-Marco and Piper are now scuba divers in the reef! You can find them in the bottom tray!
-New start page and refreshed app icon.
-We've reduced the app size by 40%!

​Happy Exploring!​

We squashed some digital bugs in this update.

If your child loves the ocean, try our new app, MARCOPOLO WORLD SCHOOL, our new flagship learning platform. Your child will enjoy lessons about the OCEAN, SPACE, RAINFOREST, WEATHER, PETS and more- 100s of lessons and activities focused on literacy, math and science. New lessons and activities added EVERY WEEK! Download World School by tapping the link in MarcoPolo Ocean.

We squashed some digital bugs in this update.

New lessons and activities added EVERY WEEK! Download World School by tapping the link in MarcoPolo Ocean.

Ahoy Ocean explorers!
We've added 10 NEW FISH!
We've also updated the app icon and added a new age gate to the Parent's Corner.
Happy exploring!

• Native back button now works throughout the app
• Crashing issue on larger tablets after minimising has been fixed
• Improved image quality for multiple animals
